name: Paintballin'
description:
Paintballin' Is a game where you ride along a rail cart and shoot at differently colored objects. Match the target's color with the correct paintball to score a point. See how many points you can score before the ride comes to a stop!

Controls:

Move your mouse to aim, click to shoot

1-3 changes your left color, 4-6 changes your right color, additionally q/a and e/d toggles up/down your left and right colors respectfully.

Version 1 is out! Will try to implement start/end screens and a score system at a later date.

Project by Amir Gonzalez and Dustin Wikoff
